Text.Page: I've gone over my records, and the name <PCNAME> does not appear. You have the wrong bank.
You want us to hold onto something for you, friend?
Do you have something in our vaults, friend? Or did you want to put something there?
Greetings, friend. How may we serve you today?
The bank is not currently open for business. We are busy building a more sophisticated form of society!
